page.title: 03Farming-2
page.content:
If the cattle are unwell in any way, this may affect the quality and quantity of the milk produced.
Another problem for the farm worker, which is the reason why many people do not want to work on farms, is that the longest working days tend to be during the best of the summer weather and some workers have to work from 6.00 am to 10.00 pm with very few breaks for several days on the trot.
The main breeds are{Hereford/Fresian} cross to give a good milk yield. An average of{4.5 gallons}per cow per day is produced. The milk is sold through the{Scottish Milk Marketing{Board.} Cows are kept indoors from October to April but it varies depending on the mildness of the winter.
